title: The Man at the Fence
description: Brandy Dixon's life didn't turn out the way she'd planned. A teen mom who dropped out of high school, she spends her days working a dead-end job and living a dead-end existence. But at the community festival where she goes to celebrate Halloween with her mother, her baby and her niece, there's a strange man watching the children on the playground. Even though he's dressed as the Grim Reaper, only Brandy seems to realize he's there. As her fear escalates, she must is that a costume, or is it real? And for whom has he come?A short story by the author of "Trigger Finger" and "The Demon."
author: Jackson Spencer Bell
